title: Ticket #2341: Copying a classad in schedd should collapse chained ads
description:
We have had multiple instances of the schedd crashing because "deep" copies of job classads from the job queue do not collapse in attributes from chained classads (aka cluster ads).

We should always collapse chained ads into a copy of a job ad (aka in the copy ctor and assignment operator). In other words, make a deep copy of a classad instead of doing a deep copy of most things and a shallow copy of the chained ad. Hopefully this will prevent bugs like #2294 from being introduced in the future.
remarks: This may have originated as the indirect result of a LIGO ticket (#2294), but it's not something LIGO is asking for, so I'm removing us as the customer group.
